DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate if radiation and chemotherapy treatment cause cardiac abnormalities among survivors of Hodgkin's lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: Early Markers of Radiation-Induced Cardiac Injury in Hodgkin Lymphoma Treated With Radiation Therapy
